item.title: Run code in Docker container
item.description: Running your code inside of Docker container can save you from installing, sometimes very complex, tree of dependencies on your local computer. Introduction Following post presents a few steps, that will allow you to run your applications / scripts in an interactive way inside the Docker container. First let’s look at the general command for running Docker containers: docker run [OPTIONS] IMAGE[:TAG|@DIGEST] [COMMAND] [ARG...] Using this command we can run our first example which in this case is echo command:
